text: A Nation Like No Other: Why American Exceptionalism Matters is a political nonfiction book by American politician and author Newt Gingrich. It deals with American exceptionalism, and how the modern-day conservative take on the theorem relates to that of the Founding Fathers.https://www.amazon.com/Nation- Like-No-Other-Exceptionalism/dp/1596982713 Amazon profile ==References== Category:2011 non-fiction books Category:Books by Newt Gingrich
title: A Nation Like No Other
